new_skill_specs.name: extract_text_from_image
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract all text from an image to identify numerical values and other relevant information.
edge_cases: Images with poor quality or low contrast
Text with unusual fonts or orientations

tests.expect: Extracted text from the image with hash 56092fe52d68

new_skill_specs.name: identify_missing_value
new_skill_specs.purpose: Identify and return the missing numerical value from the extracted text.

tests.input: The total is 100, but only 75 is accounted for.
